article: james m. kilts , the outsider whom gillette co. is counting on to revive its fortunes , has been called many things during his career : a decisive manager adept at turning around troubled businesses , a passionate unk , a winner who engineered one of the biggest mergers in the food industry _ and a unk who cut costs and sold his last company to tobacco giant philip morris , a move that made him an estimated $ ## million .
abstract: turnaround ace james m. kilts takes a look at gillette
